item.title: 澳大利亚女首富将美股赌注翻倍至 25 亿美元
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之际，亿万富翁矿业巨头吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）在今年前三个月向大盘追踪基金投入了数亿美元，增持了美国股票。【原文：Billionaire mining magnate Gina Rinehart poured hundreds of millions of dollars into broad market-tracking funds during the first three months of the year, boosting holdings of US equities as Donald Trump returned to the White House.】

item.title: 微软有望在团队调查中躲过欧盟反垄断罚款
item.description: 微软公司有望躲过巨额反垄断罚款，因为欧盟监管机构表示，他们正在就这家美国软件巨头提出的和解方案征求反馈意见，以解决对其 Teams 视频会议应用程序非法捆绑的调查。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is on track to dodge a hefty antitrust fine after European Union watchdogs said they’re seeking feedback on the US software giant’s offer to settle an investigation into illegal bundling of its Teams video-conferencing app.】

item.title: 美国优先 "贸易的复苏锻造了新的股票领袖
item.description: 本周，随着关税紧张局势的缓和，"美国优先"（America First）贸易重新崛起，至少目前是这样。【原文：An unlikely cohort has climbed to the top of the S&P 500 Index’s leaderboard, powered by a resurgence of the America First trade this week as tariff tensions eased, at least for now.】

item.title: 据说激光雷达制造商 Hesai 将秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最大的驾驶辅助系统激光雷达传感器制造商中国和赛集团已秘密申请在香港上市。【原文：China’s Hesai Group, the world’s largest maker of lidar sensors used in driver assistance systems, has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将在数周内确定其他国家的关税税率
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将在 "未来两到三周内 "确定美国贸易伙伴的关税税率，并称他的政府缺乏与所有贸易伙伴谈判达成协议的能力。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would set tariff rates for US trading partners “over the next two to three weeks,” saying his administration lacks the capacity to negotiate deals with all of its trading partners.】

item.title: 中国养猪企业牧原据说将聘请银行在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，生猪饲养者和猪肉生产商牧原食品股份有限公司已聘请中信证券股份有限公司、高盛集团和摩根士丹利为其今年的香港上市工作服务。【原文：Pig breeder and pork producer Muyuan Foods Co. has hired Citic Securities Co., Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley to work on its Hong Kong listing this year, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，俄罗斯通胀可能趋于稳定
item.description: 俄罗斯的物价增长在 4 月份可能停止了加速，这是六个月来的第一次，这为启动期待已久的货币宽松政策提供了支持。【原文：Price growth in Russia likely halted its acceleration in April for the first time in six months, bolstering the case for kicking off long-awaited monetary easing.】

item.title: 特朗普 "解放日 "前夕欧盟对美出口激增
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布与世界其他国家展开所谓的 "解放日 "贸易战之前的一个月里，欧盟对美国的出口大幅增长。【原文：The European Union’s exports to the US rocketed in the month before President Donald Trump unveiled his so-called “Liberation Day” trade war with the rest of the world.】

item.title: 汇丰银行认为日本、印度和中国在贸易协议谈判中受到青睐
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）首席亚洲经济学家弗雷德里克-诺伊曼（Frederic Neumann）认为，日本、印度和中国很可能在与美国达成长期贸易协议方面处于 "领先地位"，而新加坡和澳大利亚也可能 "出人意料地领先"。【原文：Japan, India and China are likely in “pole position” to secure a long-term trade deal with the US, while Singapore and Australia could also “unexpectedly race ahead,” according to Frederic Neumann, chief Asia economist at HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 印尼财富基金洽谈援助旗舰航空公司鹰航空公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼旗舰航空公司印尼鹰航空公司（Garuda）正与印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）就注资事宜进行谈判，该基金正努力改善其财务状况。【原文：Garuda is in talks with Indonesia’s sovereign wealth fund Danantara about an injection of capital, people familiar with the matter said, as the nation’s flagship airline struggles to right its finances.】

item.title: 亚特兰大联储拉斐尔-博斯蒂克谈极端不确定性下的货币政策
item.description:
如何在如此多的变化中保持美联储目标的平衡？【原文：

How to keep the Fed's goals in balance with so much in flux.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：博斯蒂克谈不确定时期的美联储政策（播客）
item.description: 现在进行经济预测显然异常困难。没有人真正知道关税会如何影响美国经济。除此之外，没有人知道关税的最终状态会是怎样，也没有人知道关税是否会稳定在一个可预测的水平上。那么，在这种环境下如何实施货币政策呢？本期节目在亚特兰大联邦储备银行录制，我们采访了亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克。他向我们介绍了他是如何考虑双重任务的【原文：This is obviously an extraordinarily difficult time to make economic forecasts. Nobody really knows how tariffs will effect the US economy. And beyond that, nobody knows what the ultimate state of tariffs will be, or if they’ll ever settle into a predictable rate. So how do you conduct monetary policy in this environment? On this episode, recorded at the Federal Reserve Bank in Atlanta, we spoke with Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic. He walked us through how he’s thinking about the dual mand】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克表示今年将降息一次，但不会出现衰退
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他预计美国经济今年将放缓，但不会陷入衰退，并重申他认为美国将在2025年降息一次。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he expects the US economy to slow this year but not fall into recession, and reiterated that he sees one interest-rate cut in 2025.】

item.title: 印度央行将与贷款人讨论流动性管理问题
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度央行将于下周与贷款机构会面，讨论对其金融系统资金管理方式可能做出的改变，以确保其利率决策能有效传递到更广泛的经济领域。【原文：India’s central bank will meet lenders next week to discuss potential changes to the way it manages funds in the financial system, people familiar with the matter said, as it seeks to ensure its rate decisions are effectively passed through to the broader economy.】

item.title: Charter 正与竞争对手考克斯通信公司洽谈合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Charter Communications Inc. 正在与私人控股的 Cox Communications 就合并事宜进行深入谈判，这项交易将使美国最大的两家有线电视服务提供商联合起来。【原文：Charter Communications Inc. is in advanced talks to combine with privately held Cox Communications in a deal that would unite two of the biggest US cable providers, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 对冲基金半夏因不良贷款警告抛弃中国银行
item.description: 一家颇具影响力的中国宏观对冲基金正在抛售中国的银行股票，因为人们预计，随着房地产危机没有减弱的迹象，不良贷款的积累将会升级。【原文：An influential Chinese macro hedge fund is dumping stocks of the nation’s banks on expectations a build up in bad loans will escalate as the property crisis shows no sign of abating.】

item.title: 特朗普关闭的最低关税漏洞是什么？
item.description: 一个过去在报关行之外鲜为人知的拉丁语词汇，今年却成了头条新闻。这要归功于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普决定从 5 月 2 日起关闭对来自中国大陆和香港的 "微量 "商品的关税漏洞。【原文：A Latin term that used to be little-known outside the world of customs brokers has become the stuff of headlines this year. That’s thanks to a decision by US President Donald Trump to close a tariff loophole for “de minimis” merchandise from mainland China and Hong Kong from May 2.】

item.title: 捷克利率制定者 5 月支持 "适度限制 "立场
item.description: 5 月 7 日的会议记录显示，捷克央行行长们一致认为货币政策需要保持 "适度限制性"，以应对持续的国内价格压力和不确定的全球经济前景。【原文：Czech central bankers agreed monetary policy needed to remain “moderately restrictive” to address persistent domestic price pressures and uncertain global economic outlook, minutes from the May 7 meeting showed.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴市场货币因美联储鸽派预期和贸易希望而上涨
item.description: 周五，印尼盾和韩元领涨整个新兴亚洲货币，对美联储放宽政策的预期使美元持续走低。【原文：The rupiah and won led gains in currencies across emerging Asia on Friday, with expectations of Federal Reserve policy easing keeping the greenback on the back foot.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，欧洲股市迎来第五周上涨
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势降温提振了投资者情绪，同时企业财报季好于预期，欧洲股市将迎来连续第五周上涨。【原文：European stocks were set to wrap up a fifth straight week of gains as cooling trade tensions globally boosted investor sentiment, while the corporate earnings season came in better than expected.】

item.title: 南非公司为 Cell C 移动电话供应商上市铺平道路
item.description: 蓝色标签电信有限公司（Blue Label Telecoms Ltd.）在提出业务重组以最终促成南非第四大无线运营商 Cell C Ltd.上市后，股价飙升至近七年来的最高点。【原文：Blue Label Telecoms Ltd. surged to the highest in almost seven years after it proposed restructuring of its business to ultimately enable a listing of Cell C Ltd., South Africa’s fourth-largest wireless carrier.】

item.title: 埃及正在商谈购买液化天然气至 2030 年，以抵消疲软的产量
item.description: 埃及正在寻求购买液化天然气，直至本世纪末，此举是为了满足夏季激增的电力需求，并取代国内日渐下滑的产量。【原文：Egypt is looking to buy liquefied natural gas through the end of the decade, a move to meet surging summer power demand and supplant flagging domestic production.】

item.title: TPG 支持的 XCL 获得阿波罗和 Partners Group 私人贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由私募股权公司 TPG 支持的学校所有者和运营商 XCL 教育公司已获得 4 亿美元的私人信用贷款，用于对现有债务进行再融资。【原文：XCL Education, a school owner and operator backed by private equity firm TPG, has obtained a $400 million private credit loan to refinance its existing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南与泰国在经济关系不断发展中提升关系
item.description: 越南和泰国将外交关系提升为全面战略合作伙伴关系，并计划不久双边贸易额将达到 250 亿美元。【原文：Vietnam and Thailand elevated diplomatic ties to a comprehensive strategic partnership and targeted bilateral trade to hit $25 billion soon.】

item.title: 简街指数衍生品交易遭印度监管机构调查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度资本市场监管部门正在对简街集团的指数衍生品交易进行调查。【原文：India’s capital markets regulator is conducting an investigation of index derivatives trades by Jane Street Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者追逐特朗普时代的赢家，印度再次成为贸易热点
item.description: 由于投资者押注亚洲第三大经济体能在唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战中胜出，全球资金正重新涌入印度，推动了数十亿美元的企业融资交易，并使股价创下近七个月的新高。【原文：Global funds are pouring money back into India, driving billion-dollar corporate financing deals and sending stocks prices to near a seven-month high, as investors bet that Asia’s third-largest economy can emerge as a winner in President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为世界并未陷入货币战争
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪驳斥了目前正在发生外汇政策冲突的说法。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau dismissed a suggestion that a conflict in foreign-exchange policies is currently taking place.】

item.title: 印度股市反弹，大宗商品交易创九个月新高
item.description: 在当地股市反弹的推动下，印度掀起了一股二级股票销售热潮，交易量达到近九个月来的最高水平。【原文：A wave of secondary share sales in India, driven by a rebound in local equities, is pushing the deal volume to the highest level in nearly nine months.】

item.title: 卡地亚珠宝需求回升，历峰集团销售额上升
item.description: 历峰集团（Richemont SA）全年销售额增长，原因是卡地亚品牌持续走红，使该瑞士集团在奢侈品市场疲软的情况下，比路威酩轩集团（LVMH）等竞争对手更具韧性。【原文：Richemont SA posted a rise in full-year sales as the continued popularity of its Cartier brand allowed the Swiss group to be more resilient than rivals like LVMH in a softening luxury-goods market.】

item.title: 卡扎克告诉 CNBC，欧洲央行现在 "相对接近 "终端利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克说，如果今年通胀率恢复到 2% 的基本假设成真，那么欧元区借贷成本的削减就接近终点了。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said cuts in euro-zone borrowing costs are nearing their end-point if the base case for inflation returning to 2% this year materializes.】
